#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
int main()
{
    vector <pp> v;
    int j,n,c,t,i,k,x,l;
    cin >> t;
    for(k=1;k<=t;k++){
        v.clear();
        cin >> n;
        cin >> l;
        for(i=0;i<l;i++){
            cin >> x;
            v.push_back(pp(x,i+1));
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        i = 0;
        j = l-1;
        int max1,min1;
        int sum = 0;
        while(i<l && j>=0){
            sum = v[i].first + v[j].first;
            if(sum==n){
                if(v[i].second > v[j].second){
                    max1 = v[i].second;
                    min1 = v[j].second;
                }else{
                    min1 = v[i].second;
                    max1 = v[j].second;
                }
                cout << "Case #" << k << ": " << min1 << " " << max1 << endl;
                break;
            }else if(sum < n){
                i++;
            }else{
                j--;
            }
        }

    }
    return 0;

}
